comment: He is a best professor i ever had in my life. He is the very easy and friendly. He is  very responsible and knowledgeable person. In his class we just have to go in lab,   do our work and leave that is it. He never check out lab notebook  except final. If you want to take this lab you will get an A for sure. And I also want to take him in 1212again
Professor Miller was a great lab instructor! Very caring, patient and always willing to help! Would definitely take him again for 1212 lab if I could!!!
